ROW.DATDSC: select a.guid, b.id||'-'||b.name, a.biltyp,a.subtyp||'-'||b.subdesc, a.bilid, to_char(a.crtdat,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), a.crtusr||'-'||a.crtusrnam, to_char(dat,'yyyy-mm-dd'), a.corpid||'-'||a.corpnam, a.locid||'-'||a.locnam, decode(a.stat,'1','未审','2','已审') from bilhdr a,biltypref b where a.stat like '%[%STAT]%' and a.biltyp like '%[%BILTYP]%' and a.bilid like '%[%BILID]%' and a.biltyp = b.id and nvl(a.subtyp,'1') = b.subtyp and to_char(a.dat,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=decode('[%DAT1]','','1900-01-01','[%DAT1]') and to_char(a.dat,'yyyy-mm-dd')<=decode('[%DAT2]','','2999-12-31','[%DAT2]') order by a.crtdat,a.biltyp,b.subtyp,a.bilid
